backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing enquiries with submit, get by id, and get-all functions stored in a Map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two features, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes using OKLCH colors.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with root layout and page routes for all site sections.
frontend/src/components/ImageGalleryGrid: Reusable image grid component with modal preview using Dialog.
frontend/src/components/ProjectCard.tsx: Card component displaying a project's title, location, and description.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCard.tsx: Card component showing a service with icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with company info, links, contact details, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header with logo and navigation including mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper including header, footer, and routed content outlet.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing authenticated or anonymous backend actors with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication via AuthClient, exposing identity state and login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitEnquiry.ts: Implements a React Query mutation that submits an enquiry through an actor and invalidates the enquiries cache on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/validation/enquiryValid: Validates enquiry form fields, ensuring required fields, contact info, email format, and minimum message length.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/EnquiryPage.tsx: Renders a contact form with validation and submits enquiries, also showing direct contact details.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays a gallery of project images using an image grid component.
frontend/src/pages/MajorClientsPage.tsx: Shows a list of major clients and a showcase image highlighting prominent organizations.
frontend/src/pages/MajorProjectsPage.tsx: Presents major completed and ongoing projects with descriptions and supporting images.
frontend/src/pages/QualitySafetyPolicyPa: Renders the Quality and Safety Policy page with an intro, image, and card-based sections detailing quality, safety, and compliance commitments.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays the Services page with a hero section, image, and a grid of service cards populated from a local list.
frontend/src/pages/TrustedElectricalCont: Implements the landing page with a hero banner, company overview, highlights, and navigation buttons to services and enquiry pages.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and required plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, known issues, and architectural notes for the BM Enterprises website build.
